 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצֵל‎</span>] **verb Niph\`al** ==be sluggish== (Late Hebrew in derived species, and derivatives; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> III. ***stick fast in coitu***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2086</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be stupid***); — ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתֵּֿעָֽצְלוּ לָלֶכֶת‎</span> [[Judg.18.9|Judg 18:9]] ***be not sluggish in going***.
